text: Steppenwolf is a fictional supervillain appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. The character was created by Jack Kirby and made his first appearance in New Gods #7 (February 1972). Steppenwolf (which is German for "wolf of the steppe", or coyote) is one of the New Gods, the uncle of the archvillain Darkseid. == Fictional character biography == Steppenwolf is an immortal with superhuman strength, speed and stamina appropriate to his race. He is an experienced military leader.
